SidePanel.Title: Already have a user?
SidePanel.Body: Login to your account to enjoy thousands of products in the greatest workshop project to ever exist.

Username.Label: Username
Username.Info: Must contain at least 3 characters which can be alphanumeric, dots, underscores, hyphens. Must be shorter than 20 characters.

Email.Label: Email
Email.Info: Must be a valid email address.

Password.Label: Password
Password.Info: Must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number.

Form.ValidationError: One or more fields are invalid. Please check the form and try again.
